pkgmetadata.longdescription: ## Versatile Data Kit CSV PluginThis plugin provides functionality to ingest and export CSV files.### UsageTo use the plugin, just install it using```bashpip install vdk-csv```Then run help to see what you can do.```bashvdk ingest-csv --help```and```bashvdk export-csv --help```For example you can ingest CSV file into tables, or export the result of an executed query to a cvs file.The ingestion destination depends on how vdk has been configured.See vdk config-help - search for "ingest" to check for possible ingestion configurations.
